translations: 毕业；毕业典礼；（容器或设备上的）刻度；在刻度尺上按度数（或其他比例分配）的划分

sentences.sentence: It was my first job after graduation.
sentences.translation: 那是我毕业后的第一个工作。

sentences.sentence: My whole family came to my graduation.
sentences.translation: 我的家人都来参加了我的毕业典礼。

sentences.sentence: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.
